alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; St. Louis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 8:37AM CST until February 20 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in St Louis MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River near Eureka. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Meramec River near Eureka. * WHEN...From this evening to tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, West Spring River Road becomes inundated at this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CST Saturday the stage was 17.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 19.6 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu Meramec River Eureka 19.0 17.6 Sat 8 am 19.4 15.5 9.7 8.0 7.2 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
